signature: TransformedMap<K, V> transformingMap(Map<K, V>, Transformer<? super K, ? extends K>, Transformer<? super V, ? extends V>)

enhanced_by.method_name: transformedMap(Map<K, V>, Transformer<? super K, ? extends K>, Transformer<? super V, ? extends V>)
enhanced_by.reason: Both methods involve creating a transformed map with optional transformations on keys and values.
The transformMap method is used to transform existing elements in a map, similar to what transformingMap does but without initializing a new TransformedMap instance.
The put method is dependent on the transformingMap method as it uses the transformers initialized by transformingMap to transform keys and values before insertion.
The putAll method is dependent on the transformingMap method as it uses the transformers initialized by transformingMap to transform keys and values before insertion.
